lemma assumes "rel_resource (A OO A') B res res'" and A: "left_unique A" "right_total A" and A': "right_unique A'" "left_total A'" shows rel_witness_resource1: "rel_resource A (\<lambda>b (b', c). b = b' \<and> B b' c) res (rel_witness_resource A A' B (res, res'))" (is "?thesis1") and rel_witness_resource2: "rel_resource A' (\<lambda>(b, c') c. c = c' \<and> B b c') (rel_witness_resource A A' B (res, res')) res'" (is "?thesis2")
